articles.author: Malavika Kaur Makol, Ronojoy Mazumdar
articles.title: INR/USD: Indian Rupee Hits Record Low as Dollar Strengthens - Bloomberg
articles.description: The Indian rupee declined to an all-time low as broad dollar strength weighed on most emerging Asian currencies.
articles.content:
The Indian rupee declined to an all-time low as broad dollar strength weighed on most emerging Asian currencies.
The currency fell 0.3% to 83.67 against the greenback on Thursday, weakening past the… [+81 chars]
